org.dapper.server.flow

Class Flow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dapper.server.flow.Flow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Taggable<Object>, Renderable, org.shared.event.EnumStatus<FlowStatus>

    public class Flow
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Renderable, org.shared.event.EnumStatus<FlowStatus>, Taggable<Object>
    A class for storing the flow computation state.
